info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 1 at 6:15PM MDT until August 1 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne WY
info.description:
SVRCYS
The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a
* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Laramie County in southeastern Wyoming...
* Until 700 PM MDT.
* At 614 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Laramie County Fairgrounds at Archer, or near Cheyenne, moving east at 20 mph.
THIS IS A DESTRUCTIVE STORM FOR SOUTHERN AND EASTERN LARAMIE COUNTY.
HAZARD...Baseball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts.
SOURCE...Radar indicated.
IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be severely injured. Expect shattered windows, extensive damage to roofs, siding, and vehicles.
* Locations impacted include... Cheyenne, Burns, Egbert, Laramie County Fairgrounds at Archer, Hillsdale, Pine Bluffs Municipal Airport, Carpenter, Ranchettes, Cowboy Ranch South, and Grass Hills.
info.instruction:
Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure.
For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for southeastern Wyoming.

parameter.value: NWS:DESTRUCTIVE HAIL STORM in this area til 700 PM MDT. Take shelter now. Check media.

National Weather Service: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING in effect for this area until 7:00 PM MDT for DESTRUCTIVE baseball size hail. Take shelter in a sturdy building, away from windows. People and animals outdoors will be severely injured.

parameter.value: SNM:TORMENTA DE GRANIZO DESTRUCTIVA en esta area hasta 700 PM MDT. Tome refugio ahora

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE TORMENTA SEVERA en efecto para esta area hasta las 7:00 PM MDT por granizo DESTRUCTIVO del tamano de una pelota de beisbol. Tome refugio en un edificio, alejado de las ventanas. Las personas y los animales al aire libre seran gravemente heridos.
